title: The Killing of Freddie Gray – Episode 14 – Uprising
description:
June 12, 2017 / Baltimore exploded in anger and frustration, following the death of Freddie Gray. Or, at least that’s the story that we’ve been told. The truth is not so simple.

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Fleslit, H-LR, Jahzzar, Remain, Uncanny Valleys, VYVCH, and Sym5.

Thank you to our sponsors!

Sign up TODAY at www.theskimm.com/undisclosed  and you’ll be entered to win a $250 Visa gift card.

Go to www.thirdlove.com/undisclosed and try your new favorite bra for FREE for 30 days.

#undisclosed  #freddiegray #justiceforfreddie
